net.dean.jraw.managers

Class AccountManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dean.jraw.managers.AbstractManager
      • net.dean.jraw.managers.AccountManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkAccessible

    public class AccountManager
extends AbstractManager
    This class manages common user actions, such as voting, commenting, saving, etc.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AccountManager.SubmissionBuilder
      This class provides a way to configure posting parameters of a new submission

      • submit

        @EndpointImplementation(value=SUBMIT)
public Submission submit(AccountManager.SubmissionBuilder b,
                                                                Captcha captcha,
                                                                java.lang.String captchaAttempt)
                                                         throws NetworkException,
                                                                ApiException
        Submits a new link with a given captcha. Only really needed if the user has less than 10 link karma.
        Parameters:
        b - The SubmissionBuilder to gather data from
        captcha - The Captcha the user is attempting
        captchaAttempt - The user's guess at the captcha
        Returns:
        A representation of the newly submitted Submission
        Throws:
        NetworkException - If the request was not successful
        ApiException - If the API returned an error

      • vote

        @EndpointImplementation(value=VOTE)
public <T extends Thing & Votable> void vote(T s,
                                                                                  VoteDirection voteDirection)
                                                                           throws NetworkException,
                                                                                  ApiException
        Votes on a comment or submission. Please note that "API clients proxying a human's action one-for-one are OK, but bots deciding how to vote on content or amplifying a human's vote are not".
        Type Parameters:
        T - The Votable Thing to vote on
        Parameters:
        s - The submission to vote on
        voteDirection - How to vote
        Throws:
        NetworkException - If the request was not successful
        ApiException - If the API returned an error

      • createOrUpdateApp

        @EndpointImplementation(value=UPDATEAPP)
public void createOrUpdateApp(java.lang.String clientId,
                                                                        java.lang.String name,
                                                                        AppType appType,
                                                                        java.lang.String description,
                                                                        java.lang.String aboutUrl,
                                                                        java.lang.String redirectUrl)
                                                                 throws NetworkException,
                                                                        ApiException
        Updates an app if clientId is non-null, creates one if else.
        Parameters:
        clientId - The application's client ID
        name - The name of the app
        appType - The application's type. See AppType for more information.
        description - The application's description, formatted in Markdown
        aboutUrl - The URL which users will be sent to about your application
        redirectUrl - Used in OAuth2 authorization. Parameters to obtain an OAuth2 Authorization token will be sent to this URI as part of the query.
        Throws:
        NetworkException - If the request was not successful
        ApiException - If the API returned an error
